name: Zulay Metal 2-In-1 Lemon Squeezer Manual - Sturdy, Max Extraction Hand Juicer Lemon Squeezer Gets Every Last Drop - Easy to Clean Manual Citrus Juicer - Easy-to-Use Lemon Juicer Squeezer - Gray/Lime
about_this_item: SQUEEZE OUT EVERY DROP OF JUICE: Our 2-in-1 lemon squeezer wonâ€™t waste a single drop from your favorite fruit! We have designed this lime juicer to be easy on hands. Watch limes, lemons, and small oranges beg for mercy, even with a soft squeeze. The holes at the bottom of the citrus juicer serve as a seed filter to prevent the pulp and seeds from getting in your way.

SAVE TIME AND SPACE: You no longer have to worry about power, replacing batteries, or even bulky juicers crowding your kitchen counter with our easy-to-store citrus squeezer. Quench your thirst by making a citrusy lemonade or margarita in seconds; simply place a half cut lemon/lime in the bowl and watch the citrusy goodness add flavor to your drink or meal.

STURDY AND HEAVY DUTY BOWLS: This durable manual juicer is made from aluminum and is finished off with a food-grade coating, making it a perfect addition to your cocktail accessories for years to come. The ergonomic handle makes the lemon lime squeezer super comfortable for even kids to use.

CLEANS IN SECONDS: After adding a tangy flavor to your recipe, simply toss the citrus juicer in the dishwasher for a quick clean up. Our juice press can also be effortlessly cleaned by running it under water.
HASSLE-FREE, ZULAY GUARANTEE: We love and take pride in our lemon and lime squeezer and back it up with a lifetime guarantee. If there are ever any issues, just contact us, and we will make it right.

title: Nice tool
content: I like the different sections for the different fruits.  The only problem I have with it is hand strength.  It really doesnt take that much to squeeze and get the juice, thats why I like it, but my hands have arthritus since I am older.  But then again its a good hand excercise for me as long as I don't try to squeeze too hard too fast.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Other than that, its wonderful and would be great for anyone.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024

title: How DID I live before this squeezer?!!! Like an ANIMAL!!  (not that animals are bad)
content: This squeezer gets the last drop of juice from a lime like I could have NEVER squeeze before!!!  I used to hand-squeeze limes and often times left most of the juice in the lime because I just didn't have the strength but this little tool makes it FUN and efficient and I actually look forward to using it!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024

content: I love this but the handle could be smoother

title: Works as intended
content: I was skeptical about replacing my old manual juicer with this one. The reviews were great, and the price was right, but it still seemed too good to be true. My hands hurt sometimes when I have to juice more than 1 lime or lemon using my manual juicer where I have to press down. Well, I ended up buying this little guy and I have to say I am a very happy customer!!! I am only upset I didn't buy it sooner... it makes juicing SO easy and painless. It comes with instructions and a lifetime warranty too. I love my new juicer. ðŸ¥°
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024
